channel.title: Make things on top of tables?
channel.description: How do you place like beer on a table? When i put it at the coordinates of the table it puts it under it. And when i put an npc at the coordinates of the table they are standing on the ground so the table goes right through them. I have seen like lots of servers with the white knights dancing on the table.

item.title: Make things on top of tables?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Pretty sure second floor but i’ll try. Anyone else know?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2008, 07:18:53 PM[/size][hr]Well i got items on top of tables u just put the coords where table is and it appears on top but you can’t take it when its on table. And anyone know how to make npc on table?

Read full topic
item.source: Make things on top of tables?

item.title: Make things on top of tables?
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

Try making the height level 1, I don’t know if that will put it on the second floor or on the table

Read full topic
